source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Assuming I was a shepherd, seeing items used for tending sheep may help me remember something crucial. At least, I hope it will...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Puisque j'étais berger avant, je me souviendrai peut-être de quelque chose en voyant les outils du métier. Apporte-m’en quand tu peux, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_001<tab>It still gets chilly at nighttime, but these mountains were once frigid. What do you think I used to stave off the cold?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_001<tab>Il fait seulement froid le matin et le soir ici, rien à voir avec la météo des montagnes... Peux-tu m'apporter des objets qui me rappelleraient le temps passé dans ce climat<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_002<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I do hate to keep troubling you, but might I see some items that a person might eat?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_002<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je suis navré de t'embêter à chaque fois, mais tu veux bien m'apporter des choses en lien avec la nourriture, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>?

source:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_003<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I feel likely to regain the rest of my memories at any moment. Just a little further, and I'm sure to recall my true form.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_003<tab>Content de te revoir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je me souviens de plus en plus de choses, ces derniers temps<var 1D /var>! Je ne devrais pas tarder à avoir une bonne idée de mon apparence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_004<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Always so good to see you, my friend.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GREETING_ANDEN_000_004<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu m'es toujours d'une grande aide<var 1D /var>! Si tu savais à quel point je suis heureux de te voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>Que voulez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Livrer une commande spéciale (<var 20 E803 /var> livraison<var 08 E2E80302 (()) ((s)) /var> possible<var 08 E2E80302 (()) ((s)) /var>)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Anden.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Appliquer un mirage sur Anden

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Demander plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les commandes spéciales

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Annuler

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>Sur quoi vous renseignez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>La sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Les conditions à remplir et les récompenses

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>L'obtention des objets à livrer

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>L'obtention de matériaux d'artisanat

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (artisans)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (mineurs et botanistes)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (pêcheurs)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Rien en particulier

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Anden will come to trust you more and more, leading him to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_000<tab>Plus vous livrerez d'objets à Anden, plus il sera satisfait de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Anden's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_001<tab>Son niveau de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion s'exprime à travers une jauge en haut de la fenêtre des livraisons. Lorsque cette jauge est pleine, vous gagnez un rang. Le rang atteint est symbolisé par des icones en forme de cœur sous la jauge de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Anden and his former self.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Anden vous proposera de vivre de nouvelles aventures au fur et à mesure que votre niveau augmentera.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_007_000<tab>Anden demande des objets différents en fonction de la classe de votre personnage. De plus, il n'accepte vos livraisons qu'une fois que vous avez atteint le niveau 80.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_007_001<tab>En dessous du niveau 90, vous recevez en récompense de vos livraisons des points d'expérience à la place des assignats mauves normalement octroyés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Consultez le sous-menu d'un objet lorsque vous ne savez pas comment le fabriquer ou vous le procurer, vous y trouverez les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions dont vous avez besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_001<tab>Les artisans peuvent choisir l'option “Chercher la recette” pour ouvrir le carnet d'artisanat à la page de l'objet qui les intéresse et savoir de quels matériaux ils auront besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes devront choisir “Chercher le mode de récolte” pour accéder à leur carnet de récolte et savoir où commencer leurs recherches.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_003<tab>Les pêcheurs pourront quant à eux consulter la description de la créature recherchée pour savoir dans quelles eaux jeter leur ligne.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Il vous est recommandé d'utiliser un leurre métallique lorsque vous pêchez.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Anden fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Anden deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_002_004<tab>Tous les objets, poissons et fruits de mer remis à Anden doivent être collectionnables, qu'ils aient été fabriqués par un artisan, récoltés par un mineur ou un botaniste, ou ferrés par un pêcheur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Anden seeks may be purchased from Aenc Ose in Lydha Lran.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Les artisans pourront se procurer les matériaux nécessaires pour toute confection auprès de Aenc Ose, à Lydha Lran, en Il Mheg.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_000<tab>La valeur de collection d'un objet augmente lorsque l'artisan qui le fabrique veille à améliorer sa qualité au moment de sa confection.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_002<tab>Vous obtenez <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Calme intérieur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> lorsque vous parvenez à améliorer la qualité d'un objet. Cet effet accroît l'efficacité des actions qui augmentent la qualité.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumulate as many stacks of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumulez-le autant que possible et apportez la touche finale grâce à la <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bénédiction de Byregot<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> pour voir la qualité monter en flèche avant de terminer l'objet<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_004<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_004_004<tab>De multiples actions permettent d'améliorer la qualité de vos fa<var 16 /var>bri<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions. Testez différentes méthodes pour trouver celle qui vous convient le mieux.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Lorsque vous tentez de récolter un objet collectionnable, une fenêtre spéciale s'affiche. Vous pouvez alors augmenter sa valeur de collection avant de le récolter en utilisant des actions spécifiques.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_001<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes peuvent utiliser <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inspection rigoureuse<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, suivie de <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sélection<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Essayez d'enchaîner cette combinaison lorsque vous essayez de récolter un objet collectionnable.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_002<tab>En outre, vos ca<var 16 /var>rac<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>ris<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ques de <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Collecte<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> et de <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Savoir-faire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> augmentent l'effet de ces actions. Maximisez-les donc afin d'obtenir des objets à valeur de collection plus élevée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Enfin, si votre méthode n'est pas en faute, mais que vous manquez de points de récolte (PR), munissez-vous de pièces d'équipement qui vous en procurent.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_000<tab>La valeur de collection dépend directement de la taille du poisson livré.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole or teeming waters where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing or spearfishing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Seuls les poissons pêchés après avoir activé l'action <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gant de col<var 16 /var>lec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>neur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> seront acceptés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_002<tab>When fishing, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_002<tab>Avoir recours à <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> avant d'utiliser les actions de pêche adéquates devrait vous permettre de ferrer de grosses prises.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Si vous considérez encore que c'est du menu fretin, munissez-vous de pièces d'équipement qui améliorent votre <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Savoir-faire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>The items sought by Anden fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Anden deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>Les commandes que vous pouvez remettre à Anden sont réparties en <var 48 F201F6 /var><var 49 F201F7 /var>trois catégories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><var 1D /var>: les objets fabriqués par les artisans, les objets récoltés par les mineurs et les botanistes, et les poissons et fruits de mer glanés par les pêcheurs.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>L'objet que vous apportez à Anden doit être collectionnable, et vous devez être au minimum niveau 80 pour le lui livrer.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>Si vous n'êtes pas au niveau 90 lors de la livraison, vous recevrez des points d'expérience à la place des assignats mauves octroyés normalement.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>La recette ou le mode de récolte des objets qu'Anden recherche peut être consulté de la façon suivante<var 1D /var>:

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the relevant recipes.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>Les artisans peuvent choisir l'option “Chercher la recette” pour ouvrir le carnet d'artisanat à la page de l'objet qui les intéresse et savoir de quels matériaux ils auront besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Anden seeks may be purchased from Aenc Ose in Lydha Lran.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Les artisans pourront se procurer les matériaux nécessaires pour toute confection auprès de Aenc Ose, à Lydha Lran, en Il Mheg.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>For Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log and recipes in question.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes devront choisir “Chercher le mode de récolte” pour accéder à leur carnet de récolte et savoir où commencer leurs recherches.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>Les pêcheurs pourront quant à eux consulter la description de la créature recherchée pour savoir dans quelles eaux jeter leur ligne.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Il vous est recommandé d'utiliser un leurre métallique lorsque vous pêchez.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Anden upon successful delivery.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>Plus la valeur de collection de ces objets sera élevée, plus vous recevrez de récompenses.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Anden and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>Pour savoir comment augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet, il vous suffit de parler à Anden et de choisir l'option “Demander plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les commandes spéciales”.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Anden's trust.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>Plus vous livrerez de commandes spéciales à Anden, plus il sera satisfait de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Anden will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Anden's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about him.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>Lorsque la jauge de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion sera pleine, votre rang augmentera et Anden vous proposera de nouveaux contrats.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Anden needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new leafy acquaintance!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>Attention cependant, car vous ne pourrez lui remettre que 6 objets par semaine. N'hésitez pas à atteindre cette limite, si vous voulez voir votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion augmenter le plus vite possible.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>Vous ne pouvez pas remettre plus d'objets à Anden cette semaine.
La limite hebdomadaire est réinitialisée tous les <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((dimanches)) ((lundis)) ((mardis)) ((mercredis)) ((jeudis)) ((vendredis)) ((samedis)) /var> à <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D0E0F101112131415161718 /var>)) 01 /var>h (temps réel).

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Tending sheep requires food, medicine, trimming shears, cleaning supplies... Oooh, what's that you have there?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'un berger peut bien utiliser<var 1D /var>? De quoi tondre les moutons et nettoyer la bergerie, j'imagine<var 1D /var>? Et aussi de quoi les nourrir et les soigner... J'ai hâte de voir ce que tu m'as apporté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Mountainous climes are nothing to sneeze at. Rather, they <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be without warm clothing or blankets or some such thing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Je suis sûr qu'il faisait très froid en montagne, peut-être même au point de neiger<var 1D /var>! Je devais donc utiliser de quoi me réchauffer, tu ne crois pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_002<tab>Voeburtite cuisine may prominently feature lamb and mutton, but rest assured that sheep cuisine prominently features leafman fronds. What goes around comes around, I suppose...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_002<tab>Je commence un peu à me souvenir du royaume de Voeburt. Je crois que la viande de mouton était souvent utilisée en cuisine... Et maintenant, c'est moi qui sers de nourriture au bétail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_003<tab>Voeburt once boasted a high population of artisans who crafted armor and weapons and all sorts of little things. I have no doubt a master craftsperson stands somewhere in these flowering fields─a leafman forever dreaming of creation!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_003<tab>Il y avait de nombreux artisans au royaume de Voeburt. Armes, armures et objets de toutes sortes étaient créés. Tu crois que l'un des enfeuillés avait la main pour se genre de confections, auparavant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_004<tab>I've been giving Eo Tyr milk and sweets like I used to, but if you've anything handmade that you think they might enjoy, I'd be most obliged.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_001_004<tab>Je donne du lait et des biscuits à Eo Tyr, comme par le passé, mais si tu as un quelconque objet façonné de tes mains qui lui ferait plaisir, ça m'aiderait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Being chewed on by sheep is not an entirely pleasant sensation, believe you me...but providing for them brings me great satisfaction. However, leaves alone do not a diet make─sheep need hay and a salt lick, at the very least.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Des moutons ont mordillé mes feuilles, il n'y a pas très longtemps... Et étrangement, j'étais plutôt content de leur servir d'en-cas<var 1D /var>! M-mais il vaut mieux qu'ils mangent du foin ou du sel gemme, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_001<tab>It's natural for people to weather harsh climes by burning fuel for warmth. But once you understand what it means to be potential kindling, you never see fire the same way again!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_001<tab>Rien de mieux que du charbon ou du bois pour allumer un bon feu et se tenir au chaud, non<var 1D /var>? Étant maintenant un enfeuillé, je ne donne pas cher de mes branches...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_002<tab>Considering the purity of the streams and quality of the soil, this area may be perfect for cultivating vegetables. It's little wonder why all the leafmen here are so verdant and lush.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_002<tab>Les sommets par ici culminent à une haute altitude, ce qui rend l'eau de source encore meilleure<var 1D /var>! Et la qualité des sols permet de faire pousser d'excellents légumes... En tout cas, pas étonnant de voir des enfeuillés bien touffus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_003<tab>Between mineral resources from the mountains and yields from my flock, supplies for crafting seem more than plentiful here. Do you think the climate might even accommodate for cotton? In the warmer seasons, of course...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_003<tab>Ce ne sont pas les ressources minérales qui manquent dans le coin, en plus de la laine de mouton... Je devais avoir le nécessaire pour fabriquer tout un tas de choses<var 1D /var>! Peut-être qu'avec les températures plus douces du printemps, il est même possible de faire pousser des fleurs de coton<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_004<tab>I asked Eo Tyr what other sorts of things they like, and they said “shiny stones and fragrant flowers.” Rather reminds me of what Tellina used to collect when she was young...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_002_004<tab>J'ai demandé à Eo Tyr ce qu'elle aimait en dehors du lait et des biscuits. Elle m'a répondu “les pierres qui brillent et les fleurs qui sentent bon”. Grâce à sa réponse, j'ai pu me souvenir de ma petite sœur. Elle aussi adorait ça, plus jeune<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_000<tab>These sheep look so content as they graze, but grass alone won't bring out the luster of their wool. A good supplement to their diet might, though... Seaweed, perhaps?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_000<tab>On s'imagine souvent les moutons en train de brouter de l'herbe, mais je pense qu'ils ont besoin d'autre chose pour produire une laine de bonne qualité... Des algues, peut-être<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Warm soup sounds like a delightful way to stave off the cold─and I daresay freshwater fish would produce some excellent stock.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Quoi de mieux qu'un bol de soupe de poisson bien chaude pour tenir par temps froids<var 1D /var>! Si la rivière n'était pas gelée, on pourrait peut-être pêcher nos ingrédients pour en préparer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_002<tab>The sea seems rather far away, but delicious freshwater creatures are surely plentiful in these rivers and lakes. If the surface freezes? Why, simply cut a hole through the ice!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_002<tab>Nous sommes loin de la mer, mais n'oublions pas qu'il y a des rivières et lacs, en montagne<var 1D /var>! Même si leur surface est gelée, il suffit de creuser un trou dans la glace pour pêcher, tu ne crois pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_003<tab>If your handicraft serves a practical purpose, it may very well need repairs at some point. A clever artisan chooses materials readily available to them, and few sources are more reliable than all these lakes and rivers...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_003<tab>En artisanat, l'aspect pratique est plus important que l'aspect esthétique. J'imagine que j'utilisais des matériaux faciles d'accès, au cas où des réparations s'imposaient... Je trouvais peut-être le nécessaire près des points d'eau...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_004<tab>Pixies seem to have a particular weakness for pretty colors─or, at least, Eo Tyr does. If you happen to find any alluring shells or whatnot, I'd be most grateful to take them off your hands.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_KNOWLEDGE_ANDEN_003_004<tab>Les Pixies ont un faible pour les jolies couleurs, et Eo Tyr ne fait pas exception<var 1D /var>! Si tu trouves des coquilles colorées, n'hésite pas à m'en apporter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Oooh! How lovely. You have my gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Ooh<var 1D /var>! Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Voilà qui pourra pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment m'aider.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_001<tab>Your generosity is humbling, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Truly, I thank you!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_001<tab>C'est pour moi, tu es <var 08 E905 ((sûre)) ((sûr)) /var><var 1D /var>? Je ne te pensais pas si <var 08 E905 ((généreuse)) ((généreux)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_002<tab>F-For me!? I cannot fully express how grateful I feel, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Oooh, thank you, thank you, and thank you again!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_JUDGEMENT_ANDEN_000_002<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Attends<var 1D /var>! Ce que tu m'as apporté est vraiment super<var 1D /var>! Tu te débrouilles encore mieux que je ne l'imaginais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Impossible d'obtenir la récompense de changement de rang. Votre inventaire est plein.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Anden once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>Reparlez à Anden lorsque vous aurez fait assez de place.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_000_000<tab>You have brought me so many nice things─it's a shame I can't put any of them to use. I daresay I'm far closer to sheep nourish<var 1A 02 /var>ment<var 1A 01 /var> than nourish<var 1A 02 /var>er<var 1A 01 /var> in my current state.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Tu m'as apporté un tas de belles choses, mais c'est dommage que je sois incapable de les utiliser, sous mon apparence d'enfeuillé... Les moutons me prennent même pour de la nourriture...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_000_001<tab>But that regret in and of itself feels like a clue─and these items do seem profoundly familiar, somehow. Hmm...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_000_001<tab>Mais cette déception que je ressens est un indice en soi. Rien qu'en voyant ces objets, j'ai l'impression que ma mémoire se rafraîchit... Hum... Huuum...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Come to think of it, if the climate here had stayed as cold as it was, I would have wilted and died straightaway, correct? A chilling thought.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Maintenant que j'y pense, s'il faisait aussi froid qu'en montagne ici, l'enfeuillé que je suis n'aurait sûrement pas survécu<var 1D /var>!? Waaah, rien que d'y penser me glace la sève<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>I suppose this floral paradise is my unexpected savior─as are you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thanks to you, I think I've remembered something more of my past...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Je ne sais pas à qui je dois ce climat doux, mais merci<var 1D /var>! Et bien sûr, je te suis également re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant<var 1D /var>! Grâce à tout ce que tu m'as apporté, je me sens un peu plus vivant.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Water and sunlight provide all the sustenance a plant could ever need, but after looking at these foodstuffs, I can't help but feel a strong affinity for eating. Oooh, yes, I do miss a good chew...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Quand je vois ces objets, je me dis que je devais vraiment apprécier prendre mes repas. Maintenant, je n'ai besoin que d'eau et de soleil... C'est un peu dommage.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>...No, this is no time for swallowing! Er, wallowing. Just a little more, Anden─remember what once you ate!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>Argh, qu'est-ce que je raconte<var 1D /var>! Au lieu de me plaindre, je devrais plutôt consacrer mes efforts à retrouver la mémoire<var 1D /var>! Allez Anden, souviens-toi de ce que tu mangeais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_003_000<tab>I must say, recently it feels easier than ever to recall details from my former life. I'm all aflutter, and I don't just mean the breeze through my branches.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_003_000<tab>Grâce à ton aide, j'ai de plus en plus de facilité à me remémorer ma vie d'humain<var 1D /var>! J'ai hâte d'en découvrir plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>I have little doubt that it's all thanks to you and these incredibly familiar supplies you've been bringing me. The desire to put my hands on them is overwhelming...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_BEFRANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Devant tous ces matériaux, j'ai du mal à contenir mon envie de fabriquer des objets<var 1D /var>! Mes souvenirs ne vont pas tarder à entièrement me revenir, si ça continue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Oooh! That's it! I-I've remembered something.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>! Ça me revient<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_002<tab>You were right, Eo Tyr─I <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> a shepherd. And I lived here with my sheep and cared for them very, very much.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_002<tab>Tu avais raison<var 1D /var>! J'étais berger, et je prenais grand soin de mes moutons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_003<tab>Yes! That's right, Anden. Go on, go on.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_003<tab>Hihi, eh oui<var 1D /var>! Tu commences à t'en souvenir, c'est super<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_004<tab>Originally, we lived up on the mountainside, across the lake. But when the Flood came, we were forced to evacuate down here. Oooh, my little flock didn't like the move one bit. They never got along with the local shepherds...though I'm sure they do now that their wardens are tasty leafmen!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_004<tab>Je vivais sur les collines de l'autre côté de la vallée, mais j'ai dû me réfugier ici avec mes bêtes lors du déluge de Lumière. Elles ont eu un mal fou à s'habituer aux bergers locaux...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_005<tab>And there was one other they didn't take to, as I remember.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_005<tab>Dire qu'ils sont aussi des enfeuillés, maintenant... Tous mes anciens collègues...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_006<tab>Back before the Flood, a Galdjent traveler once assisted me with some work. Perhaps it was due to his hulking stature, but my sheep couldn't see him but to batter him with their tiny hooves. Heh! I shouldn't laugh, but the sight was really quite charming...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_006<tab>Oh, j'ai aussi une anecdote qui date d'avant le déluge de Lumière<var 1D /var>! Je me souviens avoir bien ri quand j'avais confié mes braves moutons à un Galdjent, et qu'il s'était pris de bons coups de sabot dans le derrière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_007<tab>Wh-What's this? Have I returned to my true form!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_007<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? J'ai retrouvé mon apparence<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_008<tab>But I've hardly remembered anything! No, this doesn't feel right─I can say with relative certainty that I was never this gigantic.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_008<tab>Non, c'est impossible<var 1D /var>! Je ne me souviens de pratiquement rien<var 1D /var>! En tout cas, je suis sûr que je n'étais pas un Galdjent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_009<tab>Tee hee hee! Ahahaha! So anxious, Anden. No need to fret!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_009<tab>Hihi, hihihi<var 1D /var>! Ne panique pas ainsi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_010<tab>This is only a glamour─just a teeny-tiny taste of who you might-have-may-have-sort-have been. Or not! Either way, I've kept that fluffy, leafy head of yours for luck. How precious you look!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_010<tab>C'est un simple enchantement qui te donne une apparence différente. Je t'ai quand même laissé ta tête feuillue, il aurait été dommage de retirer ce que tu as de plus beau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_011<tab>I thought you'd feel more comfortable with the appearance of a mortal. And the more limbs you have, the more I can make them flail!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_011<tab>C'est plus pratique pour toi, non<var 1D /var>? Et surtout, je m'amuse encore plus en te voyant t'agiter dans tous les sens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_012<tab>I-I suppose this does make communication easier in a fashion... But what's this about making me flail!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_012<tab>Certes, il est plus facile de communiquer ainsi, mais j'ai l'impression que ton but premier se trouve dans ta seconde phrase<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_013<tab>Ahahaha! That's right, just like that. Oh, you are ever so droll!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_013<tab>Hahaha<var 1D /var>! Exactement ce que je voulais voir<var 1D /var>! Tes réactions sont vraiment amusantes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_014<tab>Oooh, why must you delight in my discomfort? Thanks to you, I'm bound to be battered to mulch by my adorable charges!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_014<tab>Petite farceuse, va<var 1D /var>! Je n'ai pas envie de me prendre des coups de sabot dans le popotin, moi...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_015<tab>Which─ Well, I suppose there are worse ways to go...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_015<tab>Quoique... Ce ne serait peut-être pas si désagréable...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>I think I remember splitting firewood! And resenting that I had to do so, as I much preferred tending to the sheep.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>Ça me revient<var 1D /var>! Il faisait tellement froid en montagne que je devais souvent couper du bois pour m'allumer un feu<var 1D /var>! C'était loin d'être mon activité favorite...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_002<tab>Yes, yes! You never <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> tear yourself away from your sweet fluffies, Anden. You'd forget all about your chopping and then have to do it in the middle of the driving snow. You'd be out there shivering and sniffling and muttering such dark words!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_002<tab>Oui, mais tu faisais tellement passer tes moutons en priorité que tu oubliais parfois de remplir tes réserves. Combien de fois t'ai-je vu hache à la main, à couper du bois en tremblant sous la neige<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_003<tab>Y-You saw all of that? Oooh...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_003<tab>Ouaaah<var 1D /var>! Arrête<var 1D /var>! Mets-toi un peu à ma place, c'est gênant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_004<tab>W-Well, firewood aside, I do remember enjoying a comfortable life here!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_004<tab>Ahem, mettons cette histoire de côté.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_005<tab>You see, wool was always in high demand, here in...Voeburt, was it? Yes, Voeburt! That's what this place was called.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_005<tab>Hmm... Je me souviens de cet endroit où la demande en laine ne tarissait jamais, à cause de son rude climat... Ah oui, le royaume de Voeburt<var 1D /var>! Grâce à toutes les commandes que je recevais, je n'avais aucun mal à joindre les deux bouts.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_006<tab>I would have my wool spun to yarn in the castle town, and as knitting was a rather popular pastime, people were happy to pay good coin for it. One can never have too many pairs of fuzzy socks, after all.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_006<tab>Il était impossible d'y vivre sans vêtements chauds. Nombreux sont ceux qui passaient leur temps à tricoter. Je prenais donc ma laine et descendais jusqu'en ville...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_007<tab>Speaking of, I remember gifting a pair of woolen gloves to a traveler once. Someone who helped me with an errand... An elf! Yes, I once knew an elf who was rather averse to the cold...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_007<tab>Mais oui<var 1D /var>! J'avais donné une paire de gants à un Elfe qui m'avait aidé dans mon travail, une fois<var 1D /var>! Il était tellement frileux, le pauvre...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_008<tab>Oooh? I've changed again. Eo Tyr!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_008<tab>Aah<var 1D /var>! Tu as encore changé mon apparence<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_009<tab>Tee hee! Ahahahahahaha!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_009<tab>Hihi, hihihi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_010<tab>Elven Anden! You look just like that Urianger fellow who used to live at the Bookman's Shelves. ...Well, I suppose he wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> so leafy.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_010<tab>Te voir comme ça me rappelle Urianger, qui vivait à la villégiature du Lettré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_011<tab>He's one of your friends, isn't he, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_011<tab>D'ailleurs, c'est un ami à toi, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_012<tab>Oooh, Urianger was ever so fun to play with. He was too polite to say anything ill, so we would gift him treats he <var 1A 02 /var>loathed<var 1A 01 /var> and laugh at his sad face while he ate them. What fun we had! But you're just as entertaining, Anden─don't you fret.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_012<tab>Il était tellement drôle<var 1D /var>! On adorait lui apporter des biscuits infects et le regarder les manger en grimaçant<var 1D /var>! Il était trop gentil pour se plaindre. Oh, mais ne t'inquiète pas, Anden, tes réactions sont aussi amusantes que les siennes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_013<tab>I-Is that supposed to be a good thing? I don't know whether to feel flattered or horrified...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_013<tab>Euh, je ne suis pas sûr de devoir le prendre comme un compliment...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>I've got it! I remember my favorite dish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Oooh<var 1D /var>!? Je me souviens de mon plat favori<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_002<tab>There was a tavern in the castle town that served an exquisite lamb stew. Normally, I would prepare my own meals, but that dish in particular I preferred to pay for.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_002<tab>Une taverne en ville préparait un ragoût de mouton absolument succulent<var 1D /var>! Je cuisinais ha<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>tuel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment pour moi, mais ce plat-là, je préférais le manger là-bas.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_003<tab>The first time I saw you eat sheep, Anden, I thought I had been thrown into the queerest of dreams. Oooh, to think the good, sweet, gentle shepherd would gobble up his friends with such delectable delight!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_003<tab>Tu sais, j'en ai pas cru mes yeux la première fois que je t'ai vu manger du mouton<var 1D /var>! Vu à quel point tu choyais tes bêtes, je pensais que tu n'aimerais pas en voir dans ton assiette...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_004<tab>Well, being a shepherd is more than being a <var 1A 02 /var>friend<var 1A 01 /var> to sheep. Your duty is to ensure no part of their life goes to waste─you milk them, shear their wool, and one day, yes, see that their skin becomes leather and their bodies nourishment for others.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_004<tab>Le travail d'un berger ne se résume pas à prendre soin d'elles<var 1D /var>; il doit également s'assurer à ce que rien dans leur vie ne soit gâché<var 1D /var>! Lorsque leur heure était arrivée, le minimum pour leur montrer mon respect et mon amour, c'était de me régaler avec leur viande.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_005<tab>We shepherds rely on our sheep for survival, especially in such unforgiving climes. So I did my utmost to repay their sacrifice with as happy and comfortable a life as I could provide.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_005<tab>C'est grâce à nos moutons que nous, bergers, pouvions survivre dans ce froid. Je tenais donc à honorer leur existence jusqu'au bout<var 1D /var>! J'espère que tu peux comprendre mes raisons.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_006<tab>I believe they were happy, anyway. They say happy sheep provide better milk─and indeed, the cheese I made from their yield was quite popular at the tavern.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_006<tab>Oh, on préparait aussi du fromage grâce à leur lait. J'en mangeais parfois moi-même ou j'en offrais à la taverne, et je dois dire que c'était parfait pour accompagner un bon vin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_007<tab>It paired wonderfully with ale─in fact, I remember one acquaintance of mine downing their weight in drink, so delighted were they by the combination. Their dwarven friend was perfectly appalled, scolded them something awful...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_007<tab>J'en avais recommandé à un ami qui n'a pas pu s'empêcher d'enchaîner les verres... La Naine qui l'ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnait lui avait passé un sacré savon, haha...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_008<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Eo Tyr<var 1A 01 /var>! Haven't you had your fun by now!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_008<tab>Ouah<var 1D /var>! Avoue, ça t'amuse de me faire changer d'apparence, hein<var 1D /var>!? Tu es in<var 16 /var>cor<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>gi<var 16 /var>ble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_009<tab>Tee hee heeeeee! Never enough fun, Anden─not when it's with you!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_009<tab>Hihi<var 1D /var>! Et tes réactions me divertissent toujours autant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_010<tab>Oooh, Big Anden was strong and lovely, but Little Anden is <var 1A 02 /var>adorable<var 1A 01 /var> and lovely.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_010<tab>Je t'aimais bien grand et fort, mais petit comme ça, tu es vraiment à croquer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_011<tab>A-Adorable?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_011<tab>À-à croquer<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_012<tab>Oooh, don't think you can simply flatter your way out of my discontent! ...Even though you very well may!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_012<tab>Et mon cœur qui se met à battre la chamade... Ne joue pas avec moi, je suis sensible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_001<tab>Yes, I know these waves of inspiration well. Without a doubt, I passed many a happy evening absorbed in my crafting.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_001<tab>Ooh, je sens l'inspiration monter...<var 1D /var>! Pas de doute, j'adorais créer des objets de mes mains, auparavant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_002<tab>I remember making and selling all sorts of things. Sheepskin rugs, for instance, and they fetched a good price too─nothing warms a stone house better!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_002<tab>J'utilisais la laine de mes moutons pour con<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>ner des tapis qui se vendaient à bon prix. Quoi de mieux pour tenir bien chaud<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_003<tab>You had a warm, fluffy rug in your house too, Anden. Oooh, it was so very, very soft and lovely for snoozing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_003<tab>Il y en avait aussi un chez toi<var 1D /var>! Il était tout doux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_004<tab>Oooh, I did, didn't I! I remember becoming so absorbed in the finer points of crafting and leatherwork that I once petitioned different sorts of skin from this Mystel hunter I knew. What was their name again...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_004<tab>J'ai même fini par m'intéresser au cuir et j'ai passé plusieurs commandes à une Mystelle chasseuse. Je fabriquais divers produits de la vie courante, que j'utilisais parfois moi-même ou que je vendais.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_005<tab><sigh> Yeees, yes. I had a feeling this was coming.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_005<tab>Je te connais, maintenant, je savais que tu allais me transformer en Mystel.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_006<tab>Hee hee hee! You know me so well, Anden.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_006<tab>Hihihi<var 1D /var>! Tu lis dans mes pensées, à ce que je vois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_007<tab>But you don't have to restrain yourself. I do so love it when you bluster and fluster and wiggle about in delightful confusion. Go on, go on!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_007<tab>Mais ne te retiens pas, tu peux me montrer ton adorable minois paniqué et surpris, tu sais<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_008<tab>Eh? Be flustered on command? That's not─! How am I supposed to─? ...Oooh, I'm doing it, aren't I?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_008<tab>T-tu crois que me complimenter suffira à me faire rougir<var 1D /var>? Eh bien, tu as totalement raison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_009<tab>That reminds me─they say there's a fiery red Mystel made entirely of crystal who is friends with our king. Any friend of the king must be friends with their sapling, right?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_009<tab>D'ailleurs, en parlant de couleur rouge, j'ai ouï dire que notre monarque avait un ami Mystel à la chevelure carmin et au corps entièrement constitué de cristal<var 1D /var>! Tu le connais aussi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_010<tab>I knew it. Urianger and the crystal Mystel─what lovely friends you have!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_004_010<tab>Oh, je m'en doutais<var 1D /var>! Comme je t'envie d'avoir tant d'amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_011<tab>Friends...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_011<tab>Des amis... Huuum...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_012<tab>...Do you suppose I had friends? I remember a particular group of people with whom I associated... Yes, they would help me with work sometimes, and...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_012<tab>Est-ce que j'en avais, moi aussi<var 1D /var>? Je crois me souvenir d'un groupe d'individus que j'appréciais et qui m'aidaient dans mon travail...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_013<tab>Oooh, that's right! Those people I've been remembering─they were travelers!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_013<tab>Aaah, mais c'est bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Toutes ces personnes dont j'ai parlé faisaient partie d'un même groupe de voyageurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_014<tab>A Galdjent...two elves...a dwarf and a Mystel...eh? There was one more, wasn't there? Who was it... A...Hume?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_014<tab>Un Galdjent, deux Elfes, une Naine et une Mystelle... Tiens<var 1D /var>? J'ai l'impression qu'il manque quelqu'un... Un homme... Oui, un Hume...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_015<tab>Of course! Ardbert!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_015<tab>Aaah, ça y est, je sais<var 1D /var>! Il s'appelait Ardbert<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_016<tab>Wait, what's that look for? Did you know Ardbert as well?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_016<tab>Vu ta réaction... Tu le connais<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_017<tab>What a coincidence! Well, I suppose he <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> traverse the realm on his various adventures─but he and his comrades spent a winter here, once.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_017<tab>Ouah, comme le monde est petit<var 1D /var>! Après tout, c'est vrai qu'il voyageait un peu partout. Ses amis et lui avaient passé un hiver ici.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_018<tab>They helped me with all sorts of little requests and errands, and at the end of a long day's work, we often broke bread together.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_018<tab>C'est là qu'ils m'ont aidé dans mon travail. Après une longue journée, il nous arrivait souvent de dîner ensemble.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_019<tab>Our first meeting was rather dramatic, though─I seemed to give them all quite a shock. But after that initial awkwardness, we became fast friends. If ever they ventured nearby, they would always make a point to call.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_019<tab>Je les avais pas mal surpris lors de notre première rencontre, mais on a appris à se connaître et ils passaient me voir à chaque fois qu'ils étaient dans le coin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_020<tab>...Wait, why <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> they so shocked by me? Something feels odd...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_020<tab>Hum... Ceci dit, je ne me souviens plus pourquoi ils étaient aussi étonnés de ma présence...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_100<tab>Now you're sounding more like yourself! You did so love mingling with your sheepies, after all. Snuggling up in a sea of fluffy wool and happy bleating...although I doubt they'd let you snuggle looking like <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_001_100<tab>Au fait Anden, je t'ai dit que tu étais toujours entouré de tes moutons<var 1D /var>? Ils avaient l'air de te tenir tellement chaud<var 1D /var>! Sous cette apparence, en revanche, ça s'annonce compliqué...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_101<tab>Snuggling... Yes, I must have done, seeing as it was so...cold outside?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_101<tab>Hum, maintenant que tu le dis, j'ai la vague impression que je me réchauffais en me blottissant contre eux...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_102<tab>That's right. You wouldn't know it from this blossoming meadow, but these parts used to be far too cold for flowers. We <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> in the mountains, after all.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_102<tab>Ah, je sais<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, c'est un champ de fleurs, mais il faisait beaucoup plus froid, avant<var 1D /var>! On est à assez haute altitude, après tout...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_103<tab>I must have warded off the chill somehow─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, could you bring me something I might have used to that end? Anything you can manage.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_103<tab>J'utilisais cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment des objets pour éviter d'être frigorifié<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu pourrais m'en apporter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_100<tab>Speaking of eating things both lovely and loathsome─have you remembered that you used to eat sheep, Anden?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_002_100<tab>Maintenant que j'y pense, je t'ai déjà vu manger du mouton, Anden<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_101<tab>What!? I-I had no idea my obsession with sheep extended so far as to...<var 1A 02 /var>consume<var 1A 01 /var> them.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_101<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? J-je ne pensais pas que mon obsession pour ces bêtes me poussait à les... consommer.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_102<tab>But all things considered, I suppose that makes a certain degree of sense. ...It might also explain why I suddenly find myself craving roasted meat. Hmm.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_102<tab>Hum... Mais j'ai le sentiment que... je trouvais la viande de mouton bonne, en fait. Je crois même qu'un de mes plats préférés en contenait.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_103<tab>Regardless, while diet is irrelevant to a leafman, I must have put consideration into my meals as a person. Any guess as to what I might have eaten?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_103<tab>Puisque les enfeuillés n'ont pas besoin de manger, je ne m'en souciais pas vraiment, mais peut-être que des choses en rapport avec la cuisine pourraient m'aider à retrouver mes souvenirs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_100<tab>Looking at Little Anden reminds me of how True Anden was once so enraptured by dwarven beards. Do all fluffy things fascinate you, Anden?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_EOTYR_003_100<tab>En parlant de Nains... Tu étais fasciné par leur barbe<var 1D /var>! Je crois qu'elle t'intriguait parce qu'elle était tout aussi duveteuse, mais toutefois différente de la toison de tes moutons.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_101<tab>Oooh, the beards! Yes, for the longest time, I assumed they were naturally grown from the chin, so I was surprised to discover that they actually attach at the helm.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_101<tab>Leur barbe, c'est vrai<var 1D /var>! J'ai pendant longtemps cru qu'elle leur poussait na<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment au menton, quel choc ce fut quand j'ai appris qu'elle était attachée à leur casque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_102<tab>As an amateur artisan myself, I cannot help but admire such unique dwarven handicrafts.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_102<tab>Leurs couvre-chefs sont un parfait exemple de leur artisanat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_103<tab>...Hm? Why did I say that? <var 1A 02 /var>Was<var 1A 01 /var> I an artisan? I do remember sitting before the hearth on snowy days and making...<var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var>. Handicrafts of some sort? Does that sound probable to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_LCUT_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_103<tab>Mh<var 1D /var>? Artisanat... Maintenant que j'y pense... Les jours enneigés, je restais souvent chez moi à con<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>ner des objets, je crois... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu n'aurais pas quelque chose qui pourrait m'aider à me souvenir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Anden is pleased with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Probably Proper Person<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a augmenté. Anden vous considère maintenant comme quelqu'un de compréhensif<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Anden is delighted with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Tentatively True <var 08 E905 ((Tradeswoman)) ((Tradesman)) /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a augmenté. Anden vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((une fournisseuse accomplie)) ((un fournisseur accompli)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Anden is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Just and Generous Journeyer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a augmenté. Anden vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((une gentille voyageuse)) ((un gentil voyageur)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Anden could not be happier with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Familiar Friend-like Face<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a augmenté. Anden vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((une vieille amie)) ((un vieil ami)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if he is to regain both his memories and true form. To that end, Anden has a new favor to ask of you...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>Il reste cependant beaucoup à faire, et il compte toujours sur votre aide pour retrouver ses souvenirs.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, Anden has remembered much and more about his former life. It seems, however, that he has a different sort of question to ask you...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Cette fois, il souhaiterait vous demander un nouveau service.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Anden has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Anden and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>Anden a atteint l'objectif qu'il s'était fixé et a désormais besoin de nouveaux objets. Adressez-lui la parole et choisissez l'option “Livrer une commande spéciale” pour voir ce que votre ami requiert à présent.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Anden's efforts to regain his true form is now available. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Anden will be updated.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>Une quête des commandes spéciales d'Anden est disponible. Adressez-vous à lui à Lydha Lran pour la commencer. Lorsque vous l'aurez accomplie, la liste des objets à livrer sera mise à jour.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Thank you for bringing me so many nice things, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_000<tab>Merci pour tout ce que tu m'as apporté, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>It's always so good to chat with another person. These pixies certainly make their own fun, but their games can get rather exhausting at times...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_001_001<tab>Et aussi pour avoir pris le temps de discuter avec moi. Nos échanges étaient bien plus agréables que les farces de ces Pixies...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_000<tab>I truly appreciate your efforts, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you for bringing me so many helpful reminders.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_000<tab>Merci pour cette nouvelle livraison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>I haven't much to offer in the way of recompense, but please feel free to snuggle a sheep or two before you go. It will both soothe and invigorate you like little else!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_002_001<tab>Je n'ai pas beaucoup à t'offrir, mais tu peux caresser les moutons avant de repartir<var 1D /var>! Tu verras, ta fatigue s'envolera en un rien de temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_000<tab>These exchanges of ours rather remind me of doing business in the castle town.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_000<tab>Quand tu m'apportes des objets, ça me rappelle l'époque où j'allais marchander en ville.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Having spent most of my time either alone or with sheep, driving a hard bargain was never a skill I kept well honed. Oooh, those merchants used to haggle so ruthlessly! I never could get the deal I wanted...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_001<tab>Mais pour moi qui ai toujours vécu avec mes moutons, parler avec des étrangers n'était pas ma tasse de thé... Je n'arrivais jamais à obtenir un bon prix...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_002<tab>In that sense, handling Eo Tyr and the others feels far simpler than talking down a merchant thirsty for coin. ...I'm no longer fit for normal society, am I?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_003_002<tab>Les Pixies, par contre, sont beaucoup moins difficiles à comprendre que ces acheteurs mesquins<var 1D /var>! Je commence à me dire que j'aurais sûrement du mal à vivre de nouveau en société...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_000<tab>Oooh, I can't bear it anymore. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! These scrips we keep giving you─do you know where they come from? You <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> to know, don't you? Of course you do!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_000<tab>Dis-moi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu as une idée d'où viennent ces assignats avec lesquels on te paye<var 1D /var>? Tu n'es pas <var 08 E905 ((curieuse)) ((curieux)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_001<tab><var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> certainly was curious, so I asked Lor Ul─and they said these scrips were “liberated” from mortals who wandered into Il Mheg. Liberated! What sort of neighborhood is this!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_001<tab>En tout cas, moi, je l'étais<var 1D /var>! Je suis donc allé me renseigner auprès de Lor Ul, et elle m'a dit les avoir récupérés sur les malheureux égarés en Il Mheg<var 1D /var>! C'est beaucoup moins sûr qu'il n'y paraît, ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_002<tab>I've been positively sick with guilt, watching you accept your recompense with such innocent joy, unaware that it's all been nothing but contraband. Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Now you share my pain!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_004_002<tab>J'ai l'impression de commettre un crime en te payant avec, je me sens tellement coupable... Maintenant que tu connais aussi la vérité, partageons notre douleur ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_005_000<tab>Might I ask for some advice, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Recently, Eo Tyr has been absolutely adamant that I become their sapling... As someone who took the leap, what do you think?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_005_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Ces derniers temps, Eo Tyr n'arrête pas d'insister pour que je devienne son arbrisseau... Qu'est-ce que ça veut dire, selon toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_EOTYR_005_001<tab>Pity me, royal sapling! I've been offering─offering ever so kindly, without any sort of trickery!─to forge the pact, but cruel, Mean Anden has been so frigid! So cold!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_EOTYR_005_001<tab>Oh, écoute un peu ça<var 1D /var>! Je suis suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment sympa pour lui proposer de conclure un pacte avec moi, et lui, il se méfie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_EOTYR_005_002<tab>Oooh, I won't let him get snatched up by anyone else. He's <var 1A 02 /var>My<var 1A 01 /var> Anden, and so he shall be from now till forever!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_EOTYR_005_002<tab>Il est hors de question que je laisse quelqu'un me le voler<var 1D /var>! Ce sera mon arbrisseau à vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_000<tab>Whenever you come to visit me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I can't help but think of Ardbert.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_000<tab>Tu sais, je pense souvent à Ardbert et ses compagnons en attendant ta prochaine visite...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_001<tab>It was winter's end, the snow melting in the valley... “Back to our journey,” said he. “But sooner than you think, we'll meet again.” ...And that was the last I saw of him!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_001<tab>La dernière fois que je les ai vus, ils m'ont dit<var 1D /var>: “On doit reprendre notre aventure. À la prochaine.” Finalement, ils ne sont jamais repassés...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_002<tab>As far as I'm concerned, the only real villainy he's guilty of is keeping me waiting here so long! No matter what the rumors claimed, I always hoped to see them all crossing the valley again someday, hale and whole. Laughing together, as once we did...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_002<tab>Je les ai attendus pendant une éternité, moi<var 1D /var>! Même s'ils ont été accusés d'avoir causé le déluge de Lumière, mon com<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment envers eux n'aurait en rien changé...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_003<tab>Oooh, you didn't come to hear my sorrowful musings! Still, whenever I look at you, I feel as though something of Ardbert is there in your eyes... Heh, what a silly thing to say. My apologies.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_003<tab>Mais bon, tu n'es pas là pour écouter mes lamentations<var 1D /var>! C'est étrange, son visage me revient toujours à l'esprit quand je te vois... Héhé, désolé, ce que je dis doit te paraître étrange.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_004<tab>Promise me something, though, won't you? Go and visit your old friends from time to time. They miss you more than you could ever imagine.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_RANKUP_ANDEN_006_004<tab>Laisse-moi te donner un conseil<var 1D /var>: retourne voir tes vieux amis de temps en temps, je suis sûr qu'ils se font plus de soucis pour toi que tu ne le penses.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Anden. You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>Vous ne pouvez pas remettre plus d'objets à Anden cette semaine.
La limite hebdomadaire est réinitialisée tous les <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((dimanches)) ((lundis)) ((mardis)) ((mercredis)) ((jeudis)) ((vendredis)) ((samedis)) /var> à <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D0E0F101112131415161718 /var>)) 01 /var>h (temps réel).

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_ANDEN_000_000<tab>What is this feeling? Not sudden, per se...but new... Hmm...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_ANDEN_000_000<tab>Hmm... Je suis presque sur le point retrouver mes souvenirs... Encore un effort...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to undertake the next quest, speak with Anden as a Disciple of the Hand or the Land.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER9_00815_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Il est nécessaire d'être dans une classe d'artisan ou de récolteur pour progresser dans cette quête. Parlez ensuite à Anden.
